findings.title: Lack of frozen Update in FundV5
findings.description: The `frozen` flag behind the `onlyNotFrozen` modifier is never updated, causing the fund contract to not be able to perform any settlement when it's frozen.

findings.title: Timely Fee Distribution Checkpoint Upon Fee Rate Change
findings.description: The `FeeDistributor` contract's admin fee rate change does not timely checkpoint fee distribution, suggesting to call `_checkpoint()` before applying the new admin fee rate.

findings.title: Suggested Variable Renaming in WstETHPrimaryMarketRouter And VestingEscrow
findings.description: Rename function arguments and variables for improved code readability in WstETHPrimaryMarketRouter and VestingEscrow contracts.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Tranchess protocol, there is a privileged `owner` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations. It also has the privilege to control or govern the flow of assets managed by this protocol.
